column4: could anyone help me configure my xorg.conf? i have a X1950Pro
i can try. what kind of driver are you wanting? open-source or fglrx driver?
ok, can you pastebin your current /etc/X11/xorg.conf file so i can see it?
ok, looks like we have some work to do. you have already installed some fglrx drivers?
yes - the only thing ive added is the videooverlay - but it didnt help in videoplayback
i don't think it matters much, but i'm just curious as to what version of Ubuntu you are using
ok, roger. same here. we going to be doing several things. ready to get started?
maybe pm or own channel for this then?
